title: for Survivors of Residential Institutional Abuse Act 2025 (No. 7 of 2025), and
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Supports for Survivors of Residential
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Supports for Survivors of Residential 

Institutional Abuse Act 2025 (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited support survivor residential institutional abuse act 2025 (commencement) order 2025

title: for Survivors of Residential Institutional Abuse Act 2025 (No. 7 of 2025), and
heading: 2. The 5th day of September 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of September 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Supports for Survivors of Residential Institutional 
Abuse Act 2025 (No. 7 of 2025) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) Part 2, other than section 4; 

(c) Part 4, other than section 20. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2025. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Education and Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd October, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [445] 3
